subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: John Tavares scored two goals and had two assists to lead the Islanders over the Carolina Hurricanes, 5-2, on Tuesday night in Raleigh, N.C.
snippet: John Tavares scored two goals and had two assists to lead the Islanders over the Carolina Hurricanes, 5-2, on Tuesday night in Raleigh, N.C.
